Not an inductive goal with 2 constructors.

In environment server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \ otin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : client_state -> nid -> seq nat -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : client_state) (m : seq nat), HClient this to -> prec s to m -> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |} this, to : nat_eqType H : HClient this to LockCoh_in_clients : dstatelet -> Prop LockCoh_to_server : Coherence.mixin_of (fun=> [eta nodes]) LockCoh_in_clients Unable to unify "is_true (server \ otin clients)" with "is_true (to \\in clients)".

original: intros. intros Hclient. destruct Hclient as [Hclient_in_clients Hclient_to_server]. rewrite Hclient_to_server. apply in_app_iff. left. apply Hnin.
